data.name: Miasma Spores
data.tooltip: Bombards target area at random with <d ref="duckiesHeroIncarnateSporeBlast_StartPersistent.periodic.count" style="Bold"/> spores. Spores inflict <d ref="duckiesHeroIncarnateSporeBlast_Damage.amount" style="Bold"/> area damage and poison enemies, reducing their attack and movement speed by <d ref="duckiesHeroIncarnateSporeBlast_Debuff.modifiers[0].amount * (-1)"/>% for <d ref="duckiesHeroIncarnateSporeBlast_Debuff.duration"/> seconds.
